newsitem.title: USA: U.S. debt futures end moderately lower, off lows.
newsitem.headline: U.S. debt futures end moderately lower, off lows.

text.p: April 23 - U.S. debt futures ended moderately lower, off day's lows. Chartists said fall mainly retraced Tuesday's move up in June T-bonds. June T-bonds fell Weds on rising volume after failing to return above 108-03/32. Some noted signs of hedge fund sales as June T-bonds fell back below 107-28/32. Some said 5-yr sale good but said dealers may have bailed out. ((DerivativesDesk(312)408-8750/)) E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
